plot: "A country youth tries to kiss the maid while she is mixing the dough; and when he persists she hits him in the face with a handful of the sticky material, much to his discomfort."
title: How Charlie Got the Dough
plot_es: "A country youth tries to kiss the maid while she is mixing the dough; and when he persists she hits him in the face with a handful of the sticky material, much to his discomfort."
plot_en: "A country youth tries to kiss the maid while she is mixing the dough; and when he persists she hits him in the face with a handful of the sticky material, much to his discomfort."
